notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, R.S.; methodology, R.S.; formal analysis, R.S.; investigation, E.L.; writing—original draft preparation, R.S.; writing—review and editing, E.L. and A.E.; visualization (GIS), A.B.; supervision, R.S.; project administration, R.S. and A.E.; funding acquisition, A.E. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
